article_title: Band of White House staffers’ offspring debuts their new music video in DC
article_text:
SPOTTED: Twenty20, the band made up of teenage children of past and present top aides to President Obama, premiered their new music video over the weekend at Washington radio station HOT 99.5.

ADVERTISEMENT

The group is composed of, the son of former White House press secretary; U.S. Trade Representative’s son, who calls Office of Management and Budget Directordad; and former Obama campaign senior adviser’s son

The 13- and 14-year-olds visited DJ Toby Knapp to debut their new music video, “Waiting,” a song about dealing with depression.
